name: baas-sms-mcp
description: A Model Context Protocol server for SMS and MMS messaging services

scripts.prepare: python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt --user --quiet || python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt --break-system-packages --quiet || true
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && git push origin master --tags && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && git push origin master --tags && npm publish
scripts.release:major: npm version major && git push origin master --tags && npm publish
